mods.name: Bear Mount
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Allows the raising of cubs into full grown bear mounts.

mods.name: Building Height Strength
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Changes all building materials to be stronger than concrete for super tall structures.

mods.name: Camera Distance
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Allows the photo camera to move far away from player to get better shots.

mods.name: Custom Puck Lights
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Workshop Item that when consumed give you a crate and 4 new types of deployable LED lights(No Power Needed).

mods.name: Custom Options Menu
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Gives you a new menu when you right click with fists equiped. Includes custom jump heights, double jump, tripple jump, and adjusts out of bounds timer as well as clear vegitation and clear all storms.

mods.name: Elevators
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: A craftable platform that will raise character 1,2,3,4,8,or 16 floors. When Deploying hold R for different variations. Must be deployed on a floor structure.

mods.name: Extraction 10 Seconds
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Changes the extraction speed to 10 seconds per ore.

mods.name: Extraction 5 Seconds
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Changes the extraction speed to 5 seconds per ore.

mods.name: Halloween Pumpkins
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Allows crafting of several variations of Halloween Pumpkins to deploy around your home.

mods.name: Hard Mode
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: This makes every zone of Icarus the same with very high level animals.

mods.name: Jimk_CompoundBow_Kryptic_Camo_Mod_V1
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: This is a replacement skin for the compound bow that matches my armor skin.

mods.name: Craftables
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Allows crafting of large statues for display in your home or patio. Includes: Windmill(5000watts), wood cupboard, interior cupboard, metal cupboard, Statues(large caveworm, Superlarge caveworm, Deer stone, Deer wood, Elephant stone)

mods.name: Durability
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Bumps the durability to 120000 for almost all items.

mods.name: Easy Cave
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: This prevents Caveworms from spawning and removes the cave debuff to change the game back to pre-release mode.

mods.name: Increase Stacks
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: There are several versions people have made this is mine that I use. It bumps up almost all stack sizes to 100.

mods.name: Increased Slots
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: There are several versions people have made this is mine that I use. It bumps up a few storage and firepits storage slots.

mods.name: Scoped rifle
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Allows you to craft a scoped hunting rifle using the Fabricator bench. Has a 10x and 20x zoom option.

mods.name: Slider
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: This is similar to my Elevator mod but creates a platform that when standing on will slide out 4 or 8 floor spots in any direction.

mods.name: Teleporter
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Is a workshop item that when consumed will give you a base station and a hand held controller.

mods.name: Weapons Pack 1
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: This gives you 2 new handguns, 2 assault rifles They are all tier 4 so require the Fabricator bench to craft.

mods.name: Weapons Pack 2
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Fixed assault rifle with scope and sniper rifle that was originaly in game.

mods.name: Workshop Armor Kryptic Camo
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Replaces the workshop armor textures with custom ones that uses a green kryptic pattern.

mods.name: LevelingMod Fix
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Keeps adding points after level 50.

mods.name: Mini Generator
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Replaces the Biofuel generator model with a much smaller version so you can place it on top of items and allows them to be stacked.

mods.name: More Daylight
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Its supposed to add more daylight hours to the game. Seems to work sometimes.

mods.name: No Poison Fish
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Removes poisonous fish from all bodies of water.

mods.name: Prefilled Items
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: When liquid and oxygen containers are crafted they will come pre filled.

mods.name: Remove G Slot Restrictions
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: This mod allows you to place normaly G slot only items(Extractors, radars, ect) in any slot including character inventory. Really helps out the solo players!

mods.name: Thor Hammer
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Replaces the workshop item Meta Soda with the thor hammer.

mods.name: Tier 3 Electricity
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Moves the Biofuel generator and the spline tool to the Machining bench where it should be.

mods.name: Windmill Generator
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Allows you to craft a windmill generator. Craftable in character menu, Generates 5000watts.

mods.name: Zombie Wolf Texture
mods.author: Jimk72
mods.description: Changes the Wolfs texture to make it look like a zombie wolf.
